featured.text: There is contradictory information about Russians’ inclination toward alcohol in the 15th and 16th centuries.
To link Russians’ vodka consumption to their adoption of Christianity. 44.
Some documents noted that Russians “indulge in excessive drinking whenever the occasion arises,” while others claimed that Russians “rarely drink wine.”
To highlight the French impact on Russians’ drinking habits.

definition.zh_def: 俄羅斯人，指來自俄羅斯的民族或國籍的人。
definition.en_def: Russians are people who are from Russia or have Russian nationality.
definition.example: Many Russians celebrate New Year with family and friends.
